word: PAGE 101: PERFECTIONISM.--SOME OF THE EARLY ADVENTISTS, SHORTLY AFTER THE 1844 EXPERIENCE, LOST THEIR HOLD ON GOD AND DRIFTED INTO FANATICISM. ELLEN WHITE MET THESE EXTREMISTS WITH A "THUS SAITH THE LORD." SHE REBUKED THOSE WHO TAUGHT A STATE OF PERFECTION IN THE FLESH AND THEREFORE COULD NOT SIN. OF SUCH MRS. WHITE LATER WROTE:
